manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zofui_chickenwish_explain` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `content` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zofui_chickenwish_prize` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '奖品名称', `stock` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '库存', `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0红包 1其他', `img` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `money` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '红包金额', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zofui_chickenwish_prizelog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `pid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '奖品id', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0已领取 1已发奖 2拒绝发奖', `code` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '奖品编码', `exnum` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '快递编号', `exname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '快递名称', `add` varchar(3000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '地址信息', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`), KEY `openid` (`openid`), KEY `pid` (`pid`), KEY `code` (`code`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zofui_chickenwish_prizerule` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `isprize` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否奖品0关闭 1开启', `getedtype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0点赞值达到某点即获奖 1点赞值达到某点后抽奖 2活动结束后按排名获奖', `getedvalue` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '获奖的点赞值', `getmem` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '可获奖的人数', `rule` text COMMENT '获奖规则', `taketype` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0快递发货 1上店自提 2联系客服', `takeinfo` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '上店自提提示内容', `kefuqr` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zofui_chickenwish_wish` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pic` text COMMENT '头像图片', `title` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标题', `bgimg` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `zan` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '赞数量', `music` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '音乐文件', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `index` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_zofui_chickenwish_zanlog` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '点赞人', `wid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'wish的id', `time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `uniacid` (`uniacid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
